text: Darwin Innovation Group is a three years old startup.

We started as a collaboration of engineers 
and professionals for telecom and satellite industry.

Our main aim was to find a solution
for ubiquitous service, ubiquitous coverage.

Where we are implementing ubiquitous coverage
solution are Connected Autonomous Vehicles
by using terrestrial and satellite communication.
by collaborating with AWS, we manage to get to that real time paradigm

so that you don't have latency more than
half a second between vehicle generating the data...

that data traveling through either satellite or terrestrial
communication channel to AWS platform and from AWS data center

and for AWS data center being processed
and sent to the end user client application.
Darwin Innovation Group, although an SMB, we are a leader of this innovation ecosystem.

If we show that our products are safe and secure and backed up
with the huge amount of data that we are collecting

with the AWS platform and AWS services,
is going to help us move the innovation faster.

in the next three years, Darwin will produce
mobile virtual network operator platform,
where we want to roll out the services globally.

Although we started from telemetry
and for one particular technology challenge,

we are finding now that using AWS will actually help us
in many other areas we are looking to conquer in the future.
